verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Change my heart O God, Make it ever true. Change my heart O God, May I be like You.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}You are the Potter I am the clay Mold me and make me This is what I pray.{/lang-eng}
